## Introduction
On this page we show have we have created the data we work with on the main page. <br><br>
We read in the NOVANA dataset
```{r, eval=FALSE}
cover <- read.csv("alledata-cover.csv")

frekvens <- read.csv("alledata-frekvens.csv")

abiotiske <- read.csv("alledata-abiotiske.csv")
```

We are only interested in the terhabtype = 5130. We get this subset for each of three dataframes in the following way:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
cover <- cover[abiotiske$terhabtype == "{5130}",]
frekvens <- frekvens[abiotiske$terhabtype == "{5130}",]
abiotiske <- abiotiske[abiotiske$terhabtype == "{5130}",]
```

Lastly we save these new dataframes.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
write.csv(cover, file = "cover_data_5130.csv", row.names=FALSE)
write.csv(frekvens, file = "frekvens_data_5130.csv", row.names=FALSE)
write.csv(abiotiske, file = "abiotiske_data_5130.csv", row.names=FALSE)
```
